info.title: Aki Cheng
info.content1: Currently a frontend engineer specializing in React development.
info.content2: Experienced in game, live streaming, and electronic payment projects.
info.content4: Able to quickly pick up different frameworks based on project requirements.
info.content5: Enjoys sharing technical knowledge and working collaboratively with teams.

advantage.title: - My Advantages -
advantage.content1: Combination of frontend expertise and operational project perspectives.
advantage.content2: From operational strategy conceptualization to system development requirements and project management.
advantage.content3: Passionate about programming and frontend development.

info.basicInfo: Hello, I'm Aki. Nice to meet you.
